# Gmail

### Objectives
At the end you will know how to:
1. Understand what Gmail is used for.
2. Compose emails and send.
3. Reply to emails.
4. Find emails.

## What is Gmail?

[Gmail](https://www.gmail.com/) is a free e-mail service provided by Google that provides users with a gigabyte of storage for messages and provides 
the ability to search fro specific emails. Gmail also automatically organizes related emails into a conversational thread.

## Getting Started

You can access Gmail by typing "Gmail" on ["Google.com"](https://www.google.com) or by clicking on the start menu located on the lower left hand
corner and searching for "Gmail". Eventually you will see a screen similar to the one down below.

![gmail log in page](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27214510-e67bdc00-523a-11e7-877d-201e76ab67f4.png)

After inputting your email and password you will be able to see your inbox.

![Gmail inbox](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27214726-deec91e0-523b-11e7-843f-0687120babe3.png)

## Compose and Send

You can send and email by first pressing the "Compose" button on the top left corner.

![compose button](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27214878-a34bd384-523c-11e7-91e5-b388b1077a75.png)

A box will pop-up where you can enter the recipient, subject, and content of the email.
There are a few buttons at the buttom of the email box that are very helpful:

Formatting the text of the email.

![Formatting options](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215124-e0dea3ec-523d-11e7-8e3e-8c115e98c6f1.png)

Attaching Files.

![Attach files](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215125-e41f97aa-523d-11e7-8788-70ba8ea31f85.png)

Inserting files using Drive.

![Insert files using Drive](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215131-e6bd7b80-523d-11e7-900a-54197be1d8c0.png)

Inserting photos.

![Insert photo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215134-e9dd2e46-523d-11e7-8258-d499faaaee25.png)

Inserting link (Ctrl-K).

![Insert link](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215137-ecd3051c-523d-11e7-826a-ccc7d290faa8.png)

Insert emoji (Ctrl-Shift-2)

![Insert emoji](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215143-efde3b46-523d-11e7-967d-59c02c0db829.png)

Discarding email draft.

![Discard draft](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215146-f246da6e-523d-11e7-8544-9735e5cf7158.png)

For more options.

![More options](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215149-f50aabc2-523d-11e7-853d-8d5ef613569d.png)

After you are done writing your email just press the "Send" button and you are done!!

![Send button](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215503-8f49706e-523f-11e7-971a-85d44ac9f1a0.png)

## Reply to email

First find the email you want to reply to on your inbox and click on it. To reply to that email scroll all the way down the email
until you find a box similar to the one below and simply just click on it. After writing your response to the email click the send
button and you are done!!

![Reply box](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27215602-0904cde0-5240-11e7-938b-d9217f63998a.png)

## Find emails

To find emails in your inbox you can type on the search box the subject of the email, the name of the person who sent the email, or
the content of the email. The search box looks like the image below and is located at the top of the screen.

![Search Box](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19320775/27216020-e2086f6a-5241-11e7-8198-f5a94cb177d9.png)
